channel.title: Unable to download the ISO image file
channel.description:
I have tried multiple times to download the file from this link download/iso/17.2.8.5/Kicksecure-Xfce-17.2.8.5.Intel_AMD64 dot iso
Regardless of whatever browser I use (Chrome, Brave, Safari), the download never successfully completes. The I can see the partially downloaded file sizes 1.08 GB but the download gets stuck at like 99% and never actually finishes.
Can someone help me with this please?

item.title: Unable to download the ISO image file
item.dc:creator: arraybolt3
item.description:
If you have a Linux computer to do the download from, try downloading it using wget -c https://www.kicksecure.com/download/iso/17.2.8.5/Kicksecure-Xfce-17.2.8.5.Intel_AMD64.iso. If the download gets stuck, you can press Ctrl+C to terminate the download and then re-execute the same command to continue downloading from where you left off.

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to download the ISO image file
